text:
James W. Carroll Jr. is an American lawyer. He is the current director of the U.S. Office of National Drug Control Policy since January 3, 2019. He was appointed by President Donald Trump and then nominated to be the permanent director on April 24, 2018.
Carroll served as the White House Deputy Chief of Staff. He was an attorney in the Office of the White House Counsel for Presidents Donald Trump and George W. Bush.
